alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 10:31PM CDT until June 23 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Holt County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1031 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Page, or 16 miles southeast of O`neill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ewing and Page. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 319 and 328. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
